spec_data.Name: flowcanvas
spec_data.Description:
FlowCanvas is an interactive Gtkmm/Gnomecanvasmm widget for graph-based
interfaces (patchers, modular synthesizers, finite state automata,
interactive graphs, etc).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 03:00:20 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Interactive widget for "boxes and lines" environments
